channel.title: Server Hackers HELP
channel.description:
Ok, I was playing my server and this guy named TreeV2 logged in and said "You Gay noob" and then he said "STFU i am admin try me" then he muted me and said "Cat got your tongue" so I ip banned him and i looked at My account and it said i wasn't muted but when i talked it said i was, so i restarted and everything is fine but how can i prevent people from hacking and muteing and other stuff...Please help, My source is ModScape, I checked the source idk how he did it... :confused: :mad:
EDIT:
They are at 1, I am thinking they made a trainer of some sort, I have made many game Trainers and a flash game hacker but i didn't know its possiable for a moparscape trainer!

item.title: Server Hackers HELP
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

paulpkyou:

I checked all the files and all the sources, It said his rights were 0, Plus he didn’t know i was using modscape, he just logged in and did it all o.o

not hacking then… its probably that ur commands are set to 0 rights…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Hackers HELP
item.dc:creator: @paulpkyou paulpkyou
item.description:
@paulpkyou wrote:

I checked all the files and all the sources, It said his rights were 0, Plus he didn’t know i was using modscape, he just logged in and did it all o.o

Edit:

I checked my commands Plus there is No “Mute” command, You gotta use the report player system so i’m sure he hacked.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Hackers HELP
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

paulpkyou:

Ok, I was playing my server and this guy named TreeV2 logged in and said “You Gay noob” and then he said “STFU i am admin try me” then he muted me and said “Cat got your tongue” so I ip banned him and i looked at My account and it said i wasn’t muted but when i talked it said i was, so i restarted and everything is fine but how can i prevent people from hacking and muteing and other stuff…Please help, My source is ModScape, I checked the source idk how he did it… :mad:

think about it… maybe his name was already registered as a admin or hidden? u need to look in ur files and make sure only ur name is in there…

Read full topic

item.description:

change the mute rights to 1.
